messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3166
messages.msgSnippet: I m going back into Lurkdom now, since my true unschooling journey is only 6 months old, even though I ve been homeschooling for 9 years, and all nine have
messages.messageBody:
I'm going back into Lurkdom now, since my true unschooling journey is only 6 months old, even though I've been homeschooling for 9 years, and all nine have been stepping stones to where I am now...I still have much to learn from this list before I will feel comfortable commenting or offering my thoughts here.

Peace,

Susan M. in VA
>>>>>>>>>>>>>..

Hey Susan! Good to see you over here! I always love to read your posts on the Virginia lists...

Stephanie E.
